dt: {bc}the amount of money given or set as consideration for the sale of a specified thing
{bc}the quantity of one thing that is exchanged or demanded in barter or sale for another
{bc}the cost at which something is obtained
{bc}the terms for the sake of which something is done or undertaken: such as
{bc}a reward for the apprehension or death of a person

dt.t: an outlaw with a {wi}price{/wi} on his head

et: Middle English {it}pris{/it}, from Anglo-French, from Latin {it}pretium{/it} price, money; probably akin to Sanskrit {it}prati-{/it} against, in return {ma}{mat|pros-|}{/ma}
shortdef: the amount of money given or set as consideration for the sale of a specified thing
the quantity of one thing that is exchanged or demanded in barter or sale for another
the cost at which something is obtained
to find out the price of
to drive by raising prices excessively

dt.t: We offer quality products at {it}economical prices{/it}.

shortdef: prices that many people can afford

dt: {bc}the price at which something is offered for sale

shortdef: the price at which something is offered for sale

dt: {bc}a payment given by or in behalf of a prospective husband to the bride's family in many cultures

shortdef: a payment given by or in behalf of a prospective husband to the bride's family in many cultures

dt: {bc}the price at which an item is sold at auction

et: from the hammer used by the auctioneer to signal the auction's end
shortdef: the price at which an item is sold at auction

dt: {bc}the basic price of an item as published in a catalog, price list, or advertisement before any discounts are taken

shortdef: the basic price of an item as published in a catalog, price list, or advertisement before any discounts are taken

dt: {bc}a price actually given in current market dealings

shortdef: a price actually given in current market dealings

dt.t: {wi}prepriced{/wi} the items before their arrival at the store
Huge trucks would deliver these prepackaged, {wi}prepriced{/wi} parts to the storefronts.

shortdef: to set the price of (something) beforehand

dt: {bc}a price announced at an auction as the lowest that will be considered

shortdef: a price announced at an auction as the lowest that will be considered
